alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 20 at 9:14PM MST until August 20 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 1000 PM MST. * At 913 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Buckeye to Tolleson to near Scottsdale Airport, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Glendale, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Paradise Valley, Tolleson and Youngtown. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 100 and 162. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 213. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
